alert.note: Alert for Clinton; Cumberland; Monroe; Russell (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued December 09 at 7:27PM EST until December 09 at 8:00PM EST by NWS Louisville
info.description: The National Weather Service in Louisville has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Clinton County in south central Kentucky... Southeastern Monroe County in south central Kentucky... Southwestern Russell County in south central Kentucky... Cumberland County in south central Kentucky... * Until 700 PM CST. * At 626 PM CST, a severe thunderstorm was located near Burkesville, moving east at 50 mph. HAZARD...70 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect considerable tree damage. Damage is likely to mobile homes, roofs, and outbuildings. * Locations impacted include... Albany, Burkesville, Leslie, Littrell, Desda, Cartwright, Snow, Savage, Ida and Ellington. TORNADO...POSSIBLE THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...70 MPH
info.instruction: Remain alert for a possible tornado! Tornadoes can develop quickly from severe thunderstorms. If you spot a tornado go at once into the basement or small central room in a sturdy structure. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 700 PM CST for south central Kentucky. A Tornado Watch also remains in effect until 1100 PM CST for south central Kentucky.
